price: Hakika HaSisi tumewaandalia makafiri minyororo na pingu na Moto mkali.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tumewawekea tayari makafiri minyororo kuwafungia miguu yao, pingu za kuwafungia mikono na shingo, na moto unao waka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā aʿtadnā lil'kāfirīna salāsilā wa-aghlālan wasaʿīran
